title: Beads Passive Awareness - Auto-Detection and Environment Setup
description: Add passive beads awareness to fugue that automatically detects when panes are operating in beads-tracked repositories and configures them appropriately. Can use FEAT-050 metadata to store detection state (beads.root, beads.detected). Uses FEAT-047 env var infrastructure for BEADS_DIR auto-setup.
user_impact: Zero-configuration beads integration for new panes, eliminating manual env var setup errors and enabling seamless multi-agent workflows
